name: eyelet
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small hole in material, the edge of which is protected by a ring of metal, through which a piece of string, a shoelace, etc. is put to fasten something
mrPliskin/E+/GettyImages
a small hole with thread around the edge as part of a design used to decorate material: an eyelet bedspread
nebari/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
